name: smuttiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sexual material or behaviour which some people find offensive: Its humour lacked the smuttiness of many shows today, but I think young people would still find it funny. Some of the songs have their lyrics bleeped out because of their mild smuttiness. See
smutty
More examplesFewer examplesThe show has been slammed for its smuttiness.Jenny's qualities shielded her from the smuttiness that was often part of small-town life.The comedians are usually given to aggressive smuttiness and cruelty.
